```{r cv}
#Gonna do 10% of fixed and 10% strat, to maintain ratios

strat_dat<-rbind(data2017,data2018,data2019,data2020,data2021)


rm(sf_survey_strata_poly)
rm(sp_survey_strata_poly)
rm(rand_data)
rm(data2017)
rm(data2018)
rm(data2019)
rm(data2020)
rm(data2021)
rm(dat_list_for_comb)
rm(block_sf)
rm(factor_into_numbers)
rm(n_frame)
rm(StrataAreas)
rm(strat_dat_comb)

# save(sf_rem_fix_data,strat_dat,file="dat_krig.RData")

set.seed(111)
n_fold <- 10
list_set_fixed <- unique(sf_rem_fix_data$FISHSET_ID)
folds_set_fixed <- caret::createFolds(list_set_fixed, k = n_fold, list = T, returnTrain = F)
folds_fixed <- lapply(folds_set_fixed, function(x) which(sf_rem_fix_data$FISHSET_ID %in% list_set_fixed[x]))

list_set_strat <- unique(strat_dat$FISHSET_ID)
folds_set_strat <- caret::createFolds(list_set_strat, k = n_fold, list = T, returnTrain = F)
folds_strat <- lapply(folds_set_strat, function(x) which(strat_dat$FISHSET_ID %in% list_set_strat[x]))

obs_fixed <- fitted_fixed <- resid_fixed <- list()
obs_strat <- fitted_strat <- resid_strat <- list()
obs_strat_A <- fitted_strat_A <- resid_strat_A <- list()
test_pred_fixed <- test_error_fixed <- matrix("numeric", nrow=nrow(sf_rem_fix_data),ncol=3)
test_pred_strat_A <- test_error_strat_A <- matrix("numeric", nrow=nrow(sf_rem_fix_data),ncol=3)
test_pred_strat <- test_error_strat <- matrix("numeric", nrow=nrow(strat_dat),ncol=4)
res_list <- list()

spool<-list()

#C++ SIDE DONE BUT NOT THIS SIDE FOR KRIGING FIELDS
# load("res_list.RData")
for(i_fold in 1:n_fold){
  train_set_fixed <- sf_rem_fix_data[setdiff(1:nrow(sf_rem_fix_data), folds_fixed[[i_fold]]),]
  test_set_fixed <- sf_rem_fix_data[folds_fixed[[i_fold]],]
  train_set_strat <- strat_dat[setdiff(1:nrow(strat_dat), folds_strat[[i_fold]]),]
  test_set_strat <- strat_dat[folds_strat[[i_fold]],]
  
  n_strat<-nrow(train_set_strat)
n_strats_sep<-c(nrow(subset(train_set_strat,YEAR==2017)),nrow(subset(train_set_strat,YEAR==2018)),nrow(subset(train_set_strat,YEAR==2019)),nrow(subset(train_set_strat,YEAR==2020)),nrow(subset(train_set_strat,YEAR==2021)))
n_fixed<-nrow(train_set_fixed)
n_fixed_sep<-c()
for (i in 1:length(2000:2021)){
  n_fixed_sep<-c(n_fixed_sep,nrow(subset(train_set_fixed,YEAR==i+1999)))
}

#Setting up H_i and H_j
H_j<-rep(NA,n_strat+n_fixed)
H_i<-rep(NA,n_strat)
vess_id<-rep(NA,n_strat+n_fixed)

n_t<-length(2000:2021)
n_k<-3
n_k2<-4

main_n2<-rep(NA,n_t)
for (i in 1:n_t){
  if (i < 18) main_n2[i]<-0
  else main_n2[i]<-n_strats_sep[i-17]
}

main_n<-rep(NA,n_t)
for (i in 1:n_t){
  if (i<18) main_n[i]<-n_fixed_sep[i]
  else main_n[i]<-n_fixed_sep[i]+main_n2[i]
}

Yearly_indices<-data.frame(year=c(2000:2021),
                           ind_1=c(1,cumsum(main_n)[-22]+1),
                           ind_2=c(cumsum(main_n)))
ind1<-Yearly_indices$ind_1
ind2<-Yearly_indices$ind_2

soaky<-rep(NA,sum(main_n))

locations<-matrix(nrow=sum(main_n),ncol=2)

big_A<-matrix(nrow=sum(main_n),ncol=n_k)
for (i in 2000:2021){
  if (i <2017){
    sub_fixed_dat<-subset(train_set_fixed,YEAR==i)
    big_A[c((ind1[i-1999]):ind2[i-1999]),]<-as.matrix(data.frame(sub_fixed_dat$total_target_species,sub_fixed_dat$total_other_species,sub_fixed_dat$empty_hooks))
    H_j[c((ind1[i-1999]):ind2[i-1999])]<-rep(0,length(c((main_n[i-1999]):main_n[i-1999])))
    vess_id[c((ind1[i-1999]):ind2[i-1999])]<-sub_fixed_dat$Vess_fact
    soaky[c((ind1[i-1999]):ind2[i-1999])]<-sub_fixed_dat$SOAKMINP3P1
    locations[c((ind1[i-1999]):ind2[i-1999]),]<-st_coordinates(sub_fixed_dat)
  } else if (i>2016){
    sub_fixed_dat<-subset(train_set_fixed,YEAR==i)
    sub_strat_dat<-subset(train_set_strat,YEAR==i)
    big_A[c(ind1[i-1999]:(ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]-1)),]<-as.matrix(data.frame(sub_fixed_dat$total_target_species,sub_fixed_dat$total_other_species,sub_fixed_dat$empty_hooks))
    H_j[c((ind1[i-1999]):(ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]-1))]<-rep(0,length(c((ind1[i-1999]):(ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]-1))))
    vess_id[c((ind1[i-1999]):(ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]-1))]<-sub_fixed_dat$Vess_fact
    soaky[c((ind1[i-1999]):(ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]-1))]<-sub_fixed_dat$SOAKMINP3P1
    locations[c((ind1[i-1999]):(ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]-1)),]<-st_coordinates(sub_fixed_dat)
    big_A[c((ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]):ind2[i-1999]),]<-as.matrix(data.frame(sub_strat_dat$target_species_700,sub_strat_dat$other_species_700,sub_strat_dat$nbe_700))
  H_j[c((ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]):ind2[i-1999])]<-rep(1,length(c((ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]):ind2[i-1999])))
  vess_id[c((ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]):ind2[i-1999])]<-sub_strat_dat$Vess_fact
  soaky[c((ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]):ind2[i-1999])]<-sub_strat_dat$SOAKMINP3P1
  locations[c((ind1[i-1999]+n_fixed_sep[i-1999]):ind2[i-1999]),]<-st_coordinates(sub_strat_dat)
  }
}

krig_ind2<-krig_Yearly_indices$ind_2

  krig_locations[c((krig_ind1[i-1999]+krig_n_fixed_sep[i-1999]):krig_ind2[i-1999]),]<-st_coordinates(sub_strat_dat)
  krig_vess_id[c((krig_ind1[i-1999]+krig_n_fixed_sep[i-1999]):krig_ind2[i-1999])]<-sub_strat_dat$Vess_fact
  krig_H_j[c((krig_ind1[i-1999]+krig_n_fixed_sep[i-1999]):krig_ind2[i-1999])]<-rep(1,length(c((krig_ind1[i-1999]+krig_n_fixed_sep[i-1999]):krig_ind2[i-1999])))
  }
}

krig_vess_id<-krig_vess_id-1

krig_locations[,1]<-(krig_locations[,1]-median(krig_locations[,1]))/spool[[i_fold]]
krig_locations[,2]<-(krig_locations[,2]-median(krig_locations[,2]))/spool[[i_fold]]
  
  data<-list(A=big_A,H=big_H,H_i=H_i,H_j=H_j,s=soaky,vess_id=vess_id,locations=locations,n_t=n_t,n=main_n,n_k=3,n2=main_n2,n_k2=4,krig_n=krig_n,krig_locations=krig_locations)

  
  par_list<-list()
    
# Initial values for lambda.t, lambda.nt and pnt
# Use the estimated values as the starting points
par_list$betat = -13
par_list$betant = -8
# par_list$theta = logitp(0.8795768)
par_list$theta = 0
#Random effect of time
par_list$rand_t = rep(-13,data$n_t)
par_list$rand_nt = rep(-8,data$n_t)
# Random field
par_list$omegat =  rep(0,nrow(big_A))
par_list$omegant =  rep(0,nrow(big_A))
#Vessel effect
par_list$vess_eff_t = rep(0,length(unique(vess_id)))
par_list$vess_eff_nt = rep(0,length(unique(vess_id)))
# Smoothness parameter 
par_list$lognut = 0
par_list$lognunt = 0
# Range parameter 
# par_list$logPhit = -3
# par_list$logPhint = -1
par_list$logPhit = -1
par_list$logPhint = -1
# Variance
par_list$logSigmat = 0
par_list$logSigmant = 0
#Vess effect sigmas
par_list$log_sigma_vess_t = 0
par_list$log_sigma_vess_nt = 0
#Rand intercept sigmas
par_list$log_sigma_rand_t = 0
par_list$log_sigma_rand_nt = 0
#Rand intercept means
par_list$mean_rand_t = -12
par_list$mean_rand_nt = -8
par_list$mean_ar_t = -12
par_list$mean_ar_nt = -8

par_list$logit_phi_ar_nt<-0

# par_list$krig_field<-array(rep(0,sum(krig_n)*2),dim=c(sum(krig_n),2))
par_list$krig_field<-matrix(rep(0,sum(krig_n)*2),nrow=sum(krig_n),ncol=2)

map<-list(lognut=factor(NA),lognunt=factor(NA))

random<-c("omegat","omegant","rand_t","rand_nt","vess_eff_t","vess_eff_nt")
library(optimr)

obj<-res_list[[i_fold]]$obj

# load("first_fold.RData")

#Some data points are too close for kriging, so will krige without those, which isn't perfect but better than nothing

bad_loc<-which(duplicated(locations[,1]))
if (length(which(duplicated(locations[,1])))>0){
  loc_for_krig<-locations[-c(bad_loc),]
  omegat_krig<-Report$omegat[-c(bad_loc)]
  omegant_krig<-Report$omegant[-c(bad_loc)]
} else {
    loc_for_krig<-locations
  omegat_krig<-Report$omegat
  omegant_krig<-Report$omegant
}

krig_t<-geoR::krige.conv(coords=loc_for_krig,data=omegat_krig,locations=krig_locations, krige=geoR::krige.control(type.krige="OK",cov.model="matern",cov.pars=c(1,rep$value[which(names(rep$value)=="phit")]),kappa=1,nugget=rep$value[which(names(rep$value)=="vart")]))

krig_nt<-geoR::krige.conv(coords=loc_for_krig,data=omegant_krig,locations=krig_locations, krige=geoR::krige.control(type.krige="OK",cov.model="matern",cov.pars=c(1,rep$value[which(names(rep$value)=="phint")]),kappa=1,nugget=rep$value[which(names(rep$value)=="varnt")]))
  
  #Get observed A
  obs_fixed[[i_fold]] <- cbind(train_set_fixed$total_target_species,

  resid_fixed[[i_fold]] <- obs_fixed[[i_fold]] - fitted_fixed[[i_fold]]
  
    obs_strat_A[[i_fold]] <- cbind(train_set_strat$target_species_700,
                         train_set_strat$total_other_species,
                         train_set_strat$nbe_700)
  fitted_strat_A[[i_fold]] <- Report$q[data$H_i,]*(train_set_strat$NUM_HOOK_HAUL-train_set_strat$total_sampled)
  resid_strat_A[[i_fold]] <- obs_strat_A[[i_fold]] - fitted_strat_A[[i_fold]]
  
  #Get observed H
    obs_strat[[i_fold]] <- cbind(train_set_strat$empty_baited,
      train_set_strat$total_target_species,
                         train_set_strat$total_other_species,
                         train_set_strat$empty_unbaited)
  fitted_strat[[i_fold]] <- Report$p*train_set_strat$total_sampled
  resid_strat[[i_fold]] <- obs_strat[[i_fold]] - fitted_strat[[i_fold]]
  
  tmp_pred_fixed <- tmp_resid_fixed <- matrix(nrow=nrow(test_set_fixed),ncol=data$n_k)
  for(i in 1:nrow(test_set_fixed)){
      temp_ldat <-exp(Report$rand_t[test_set_fixed$YEAR[i]-1999]+Report$vess_eff_t[test_set_fixed$Vess_fact[i]-1]+krig_t$predict[which(krig_H_j==0)[i]])
      temp_ldant <-exp(Report$rand_nt[test_set_fixed$YEAR[i]-1999]+Report$vess_eff_nt[test_set_fixed$Vess_fact[i]-1]+krig_nt$predict[which(krig_H_j==0)[i]])
    temp_q <- c((1-exp(-(temp_ldat+temp_ldant)*test_set_fixed$SOAKMINP3P1[i]))*(temp_ldat/(temp_ldat+temp_ldant)),
                (1-exp(-(temp_ldat+temp_ldant)*test_set_fixed$SOAKMINP3P1[i]))*(temp_ldant/(temp_ldat+temp_ldant))*(1-rep$value[which(names(rep$value)=="pnt")]))
    temp_q[3] <- 1-temp_q[1]-temp_q[2]
    tmp_pred_fixed[i,] <- temp_q*test_set_fixed$NUM_HOOK_HAUL[i]
    tmp_resid_fixed[i,] <- c(test_set_fixed$total_target_species[i],
                       test_set_fixed$total_other_species[i],
                       test_set_fixed$empty_hooks[i]) - tmp_pred_fixed[i,]
  }
  
  test_pred_fixed[folds_fixed[[i_fold]],] <- tmp_pred_fixed
  test_error_fixed[folds_fixed[[i_fold]],] <- tmp_resid_fixed
  
    tmp_pred_strat <- tmp_resid_strat <- matrix(nrow=nrow(test_set_strat),ncol=data$n_k2)
  for(i in 1:nrow(test_set_strat)){
      temp_ldat <-exp(Report$rand_t[test_set_strat$YEAR[i]-1999]+Report$vess_eff_t[test_set_strat$Vess_fact[i]-1]+krig_t$predict[which(krig_H_j==1)[i]])
      temp_ldant <-exp(Report$rand_nt[test_set_strat$YEAR[i]-1999]+Report$vess_eff_nt[test_set_strat$Vess_fact[i]-1]+krig_nt$predict[which(krig_H_j==1)[i]])
    temp_p <- c(exp(-(temp_ldat+temp_ldant)*test_set_strat$SOAKMINP3P1[i]),
                (1-exp(-(temp_ldat+temp_ldant)*test_set_strat$SOAKMINP3P1[i]))*(temp_ldat/(temp_ldat+temp_ldant)),
                (1-exp(-(temp_ldat+temp_ldant)*test_set_strat$SOAKMINP3P1[i]))*(temp_ldant/(temp_ldat+temp_ldant))*(1-rep$value[which(names(rep$value)=="pnt")]))
    temp_p[4] <- 1-temp_p[1]-temp_p[2]-temp_p[3]
    tmp_pred_strat[i,] <- temp_p*test_set_strat$total_sampled[i]
    tmp_resid_strat[i,] <- c(test_set_strat$empty_baited[i],
                             test_set_strat$total_target_species[i],
                       test_set_strat$total_other_species[i],
                       test_set_strat$empty_unbaited[i]) - tmp_pred_strat[i,]
  }
  
  test_pred_strat[folds_strat[[i_fold]],] <- tmp_pred_strat
  test_error_strat[folds_strat[[i_fold]],] <- tmp_resid_strat
  
    tmp_pred_strat_A <- tmp_resid_strat_A <- matrix(nrow=nrow(test_set_strat),ncol=data$n_k)
  for(i in 1:nrow(test_set_strat)){
      temp_ldat <-exp(Report$rand_t[test_set_strat$YEAR[i]-1999]+Report$vess_eff_t[test_set_strat$Vess_fact[i]-1]+krig_t$predict[which(krig_H_j==1)[i]])
      temp_ldant <-exp(Report$rand_nt[test_set_strat$YEAR[i]-1999]+Report$vess_eff_nt[test_set_strat$Vess_fact[i]-1]+krig_nt$predict[which(krig_H_j==1)[i]])
    temp_q <- c((1-exp(-(temp_ldat+temp_ldant)*test_set_strat$SOAKMINP3P1[i]))*(temp_ldat/(temp_ldat+temp_ldant)),
                (1-exp(-(temp_ldat+temp_ldant)*test_set_strat$SOAKMINP3P1[i]))*(temp_ldant/(temp_ldat+temp_ldant))*(1-rep$value[which(names(rep$value)=="pnt")]))
    temp_q[3] <- 1-temp_q[1]-temp_q[2]
    tmp_pred_strat_A[i,] <- temp_q*(test_set_strat$NUM_HOOK_HAUL[i]-test_set_strat$total_sampled[i])
    tmp_resid_strat_A[i,] <- c(test_set_strat$target_species_700[i],
                       test_set_strat$other_species_700[i],
                       test_set_strat$nbe_700[i]) - tmp_pred_strat_A[i,]
  }
    
  test_pred_strat_A[folds_strat[[i_fold]],] <- tmp_pred_strat_A
  test_error_strat_A[folds_strat[[i_fold]],] <- tmp_resid_strat_A
  
  res_list[[i_fold]] <- list(obj = obj, opt = Opt, rep = rep, Report = Report)
}

res_fix <- data.frame("test_pred_fixed"=test_pred_fixed, "test_resid_fixed"=test_error_fixed)
res_strat<-data.frame("test_pred_strat"=test_pred_strat, "test_resid_strat"=test_error_strat)
res_strat_A<-data.frame("test_pred_strat_A"=test_pred_strat_A, "test_resid_strat_A"=test_error_strat_A)
save(file = "reses.RData", res_fix,res_strat,res_strat_A)
save(file = "res_list.RData", res_list)

  rmse_se_cv_other[i]<-sd(sqrt(as.numeric(c(res_fix[folds_fixed[[i]],5],res_strat_A[folds_strat[[i]],5],res_strat[folds_strat[[i]],7]))^2),na.rm=T)/sqrt(length(as.numeric(c(res_fix[folds_fixed[[i]],5],res_strat_A[folds_strat[[i]],5],res_strat[folds_strat[[i]],7]))))
}

#For differences in target where we remove the outliers

mean_rmses_frame<-data.frame(which_one=c("Overall RMSE","Target RMSE","Non-Target RMSE"),rmse=c(mean(rmse_cv),mean(rmse_cv_target),mean(rmse_cv_other)),rmse_se=c(mean(rmse_se_cv),mean(rmse_se_cv_target),mean(rmse_se_cv_other)))

fold_rmses_frame<-data.frame(fold=c(1:10),overall_rmse=rmse_cv,target=rmse_cv_target,other=rmse_cv_other)

save(mean_rmses_frame,fold_rmses_frame,file="cv_rmse_frames.RData")

```
